ayahs.meaning_text: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful
ayahs.word_meaning: Bism: In the name; Allah: God; Ar-Rahman: Most Gracious; Ar-Raheem: Most Merciful

fraction_ayah.fraction_tafseer: This phrase emphasizes the invocation of Allah's name before starting any act.

fraction_ayah.ayah_fraction_meaning: The Most Gracious, the Most Merciful
fraction_ayah.fraction_tafseer: Describes Allah’s attributes of mercy and compassion.

ayahs.meaning_text: All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds
ayahs.word_meaning: Alhamd: All praise; Rabb: Lord; Al-Alameen: the worlds
